publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5132 Des McNulty: World’s Best Call Centre in Clydebank—That the Parliament notes that Clydesdale Bank’s call centre at Mariner Court in the Clydebank Business Park, Clydebank, has beaten over 400 rivals to be named the world’s "Best Contact Centre of the Year" in the Contact Centre World Awards held in Las Vegas on 8 November 2006; congratulates the employees for the work they have done to achieve this world-wide recognition; welcomes the bank’s additional investment in its operations which will relocate 223 extra jobs to the centre, and acknowledges that this is another boost to the ongoing regeneration of Clydebank.

S2M-5132 Des McNulty: World’s Best Call Centre in Clydebank—That the Parliament notes that Clydesdale Bank’s call centre at Mariner Court in the Clydebank Business Park, Clydebank, has beaten over 400 rivals to be named the world’s "Best Contact Centre of the Year" in the Contact Centre World Awards held in Las Vegas on 8 November 2006; congratulates the employees for the work they have done to achieve this world-wide recognition; welcomes the bank’s additional investment in its operations which will relocate 223 extra jobs to the centre, and acknowledges that this is another boost to the ongoing regeneration of Clydebank. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*
